summary: Retrieve data from the FileMaker data API.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Specify the action to perform on the FileMaker data such as creating, deleting, editing records, etc.

parameters.name: layout
parameters.description: Select the FileMaker layout name or ID to retrieve data from.

parameters.name: recid
parameters.description: Internal Record ID used for actions like editing, deleting, or duplicating records.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Specify the record number of the first record in the range of records to retrieve.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Set the maximum number of results to return.

parameters.name: getPortals
parameters.description: Toggle to include portal data in the response.

parameters.name: portals
parameters.description: Select the portal result set to return along with the main data.

parameters.name: responseLayout
parameters.description: Select the layout name or ID for the response data.

parameters.name: queries
parameters.description: Add multiple queries to filter the data when finding records.
